sense.def:
Kdor je
powerless
, ni sposoben obvladovati dogodkov ali vplivati nanje.

seg.quote: Without the support of the party, the Cabinet is powerless.
She experienced an overwhelming sense of powerlessness.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo
powerless to do something
, ni sposoben narediti nečesa.

seg.quote: I stood there watching, feeling powerless to help.
